means: （大小或数量）不足的，勉强够的

sentence.Network_en: So far, what scanty evidence we have points to two suspects.
sentence.Network_cn: 迄今为止，我们掌握的能够指证两个嫌疑犯的证据少得可怜。

sentence.Network_en: Details of his life are scanty.
sentence.Network_cn: 关于他的生平，详细资料不多。

sentence.Network_en: There is scanty evidence to support their accusations.

新概念第三册精解 ... ●deduce v. 推断，推理 ●scanty adj. 不足的，贫乏的 ●clue n. 线索.

scanty 缺乏,不足; for want/lack of 因为缺乏 16. contempt/ despise /scorn 轻视,蔑视 17. superstition 迷信; disorder/ mess/trouble/chaos 无秩序,混乱.

list.abs: His grandfather made a scanty living by practising feng shui for people ., 他的祖父靠给人看风水勉强维持生计.
scanty: too few, not enoughscanty knowledge 一知半解a scanty crop 欠收
scansion 断续言语scanty survey 不充分调查scapegoat 替罪羊
专业词汇在线翻译、医学专业... ... 小便短赤 scanty dark urine 月经过少 scanty menstruation 小便短黄 scanty yellowish urine.

entry.tran: 偏小的;偏少的;不足的;欠缺的
entry.def: You describe something as scanty when there is less of it than you think there should be.

example.ex: So far, what scanty evidence we have points to two suspects.
example.tran: 迄今为止，我们掌握的能够指证两个嫌疑犯的证据少得可怜。

entry.def: If someone is wearing scanty clothing, he or she is wearing clothes which are sexually revealing.

means.word_mean: 1. short underpants for women or children (usually used in the plural)

auth_sentence.content: We have models, they have scanty Samba dancers.
